DOC.brief_summary: Patients left-colon cancer randomize laparoscopic laparotomic operation . surgery 6 day operation , intestinal oxygen tension ischemia-reperfusion injury marker evaluate understand pneumoperitoneum associate reduce splanchnic blood flow ischemia-reperfusion injury .
DOC.criteria: Proven Cleft Colon Cancer , Signed Informed Consent Emergency surgery , Cancer infiltrate adjacent organ ( CT scan ) , Severe cardiovascular ( New York Heart Association class > 3 ) , Respiratory ( arterial PO2 < 70 mmHg ) , Renal ( plasma creatinine > 3 MG/dL ) hepatic ( Child C ) dysfunction
